overview: Number 12 from Color Climax  Two aspiring young actresses home from a hard day at the studios. Hollywood with its glitter and fame, is just another place to these two swingers, who use their contacts as new talent for their sexual games. They cool off by taking a relaxing dip in their pool, and then sunning themselves in the company of their newest find. The conversation leads to matters of sex, and the two girls go into the bathroom for a quick shower, while he undresses. With the beautiful honey blonde showering, the other girl gets turned on just watching , and they each play with themselves while watching the other. Then it's to the bedroom , where they find their man and proceed to show him why they are really stars. He loves it, you'll love it and it's very obvious these two young superstars love it.
title: Color Climax 12 - Teenage Swingers
